hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo 'while true; do' > /home/log-user/jenkins-scripts/hostname-date.sh echo " cat /etc/hostname | tr '\n' ' '> /tmp/hostname-date.txt;" > /home/log-user/jenkins-scripts/hostname-date.sh echo " echo $(date +%d-%b-%Y_%Hh:%Mm:%Ss) >> /tmp/hostname-date.txt;" >> /home/log-user/jenkins-scripts/hostname-date.sh echo "sleep 60;" >> /home/log-user/jenkins-scripts/hostname-date.sh echo "done" >> /home/log-user/jenkins-scripts/hostname-date.sh chmod 755 /home/log-user/jenkins-scripts/hostname-date.sh
echo '[Unit]' > /home/log-user/.config/systemd/user/hostname-date.service echo 'Description=Hostname-Date-Task' >> /home/log-user/.config/systemd/user/hostname-date.service echo '' >> /home/log-user/.config/systemd/user/hostname-date.service echo '[Service]' >> /home/log-user/.config/systemd/user/hostname-date.service echo 'Type=notify' >> /home/log-user/.config/systemd/user/hostname-date.service echo 'ExecStart=/home/log-user/jenkins-scripts/hostname-date.sh' >> /home/log-user/.config/systemd/user/hostname-date.service echo 'KillMode=process' >> /home/log-user/.config/systemd/user/hostname-date.service echo 'Restart=on-failure' >> /home/log-user/.config/systemd/user/hostname-date.service echo 'RestartSec=30s' >> /home/log-user/.config/systemd/user/hostname-date.service echo '' >> /home/log-user/.config/systemd/user/hostname-date.service echo '[Install]' >> /home/log-user/.config/systemd/user/hostname-date.service echo 'WantedBy=default.target' >> /home/log-user/.config/systemd/user/hostname-date.service
sudo loginctl enable-linger log-user 2>> /tmp/jenkins-error || true
#sudo su log-user 2>> /tmp/jenkins-error || true sudo systemctl --user start hostname-date.service 2>> /tmp/jenkins-error || true
